name: soundcloud_scrape_artist
description: Scrape a SoundCloud artist profile page. Returns name, bio, follower count, track count, recent tracks, and location.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('.profileHeaderInfo__userName, h3[class*="profileHeader"], h1'); const bioEl = document.querySelector('[class*="userInfoBar__description"], [class*="bio"], [class*="about"]'); const followersEl = document.querySelector('a[href*="followers"] span, [class*="followers"] span, [class*="followersCount"]'); const followingEl = document.querySelector('a[href*="following"] span, [class*="following"] span'); const trackCountEl = document.querySelector('a[href*="tracks"] span, [class*="trackCount"]'); const locationEl = document.querySelector('[class*="location"], [class*="city"]'); const avatarEl = document.querySelector('.profileHeaderInfo__avatar img, .image__full, .sc-artwork img'); const verifiedEl = document.querySelector('[class*="verified"], [class*="pro"]'); const tracks = []; const trackEls = document.querySelectorAll('.soundList__item, [class*="soundList__item"], [class*="trackItem"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(trackEls.length, 10); i++) { const el = trackEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.soundTitle__title span, a[class*="soundTitle"] span'); const playsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="playbackCount"], [title*="plays"]'); const likesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="likeCount"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[class*="soundTitle__title"], a.soundTitle__title'); tracks.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', plays: playsEl ? playsEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', bio: bioEl ? bioEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', followers: followersEl ? followersEl.textContent.trim() : '', following: followingEl ? followingEl.textContent.trim() : '', track_count: trackCountEl ? trackCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', avatar: avatarEl ? avatarEl.getAttribute('src') : '', is_verified: !!verifiedEl, recent_tracks: tracks, profile_url: window.location.href }
